plot: A computer programmer who, after his train breaks down, takes to wandering aimlessly through remote regions of La Pampa, Viedma and Carhue. he meets a succession of equally lost souls, including a globe-trotting gambler, a circus owner whose performers left him &"because the whole country was a circus: and a tarot card reader with large gaps in her knowledge of the future.   Written by  Jim Wade
title: Una sombra ya pronto serás
plot_es: A computer programmer who, after his train breaks down, takes to wandering aimlessly through remote regions of La Pampa, Viedma and Carhue. he meets a succession of equally lost souls, including a globe-trotting gambler, a circus owner whose performers left him &"because the whole country was a circus: and a tarot card reader with large gaps in her knowledge of the future.
